entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:18 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -43.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 04:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -43.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -47.9°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 60 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
